CSCI P-14110 Introduction to Programming, Computational Science, and Data Visualization

This is the course website CSCI P-14110

Lesson 6 - Intro to Data Visualization

Today we’ll go into the basics of why we visualize, who we visualize for, and how to think about our relationship with our data.

  • Mark Newman’s Election Maps
  • Lilo & Stitch
  • Peg + Cat: The Three Friends Problem
  • FRED
  • Example Vega-Lite plot
